column4: this is weird, after doing an update just not i lost the ability to go wireless
i can only connect to the net through wired
with it i can connect to wireless, parallel to my wired connection
i'm pretty new to all this, so sorry if that was a dumb question
see, i dont even have that option anymore, i only see 'wired' and 'modem'
sudo apt-get install wlassitant and i guess to work fine you should run it with sudo
sorry forgot an "s" it is wlassistant
k thanks, its downloadin it now
after its downloaded, anything else i need to do?
just weird, i mean i do an update, and after reboot wifi has been removed. is that a common occurrence?
as i said maybe you will need to run it with sudo, and it should work fine other than that, check that you have your wireless card "on"
ya its downloading right nw, did need sudo. thanks again
its been downloaded and installed, what should i do now? reboot for things to take effect?
